name: SaralShaadi - Matrimonial
description: Hello, Indians !!!  We the SARAL SHAADI Indias exclusive matrimonial services provider are offering our services in this area since Dec 2015 and now to make this portal easygoing user-friendly, we have launched a mobile application SARAL SHAADI for our android users from all over India.   Privacy Features of  SARAL SHAADI application as listed below:  1) Verified Profiles by taking basic documents from every user. 2) The user has to upload documents to send interest or to take contact details of other Members. 3) You can set contact number privacy to access your contact details. 4) Only profiles who match your requirements can only send interest to you and can access your contact number  Key Features of  SARAL SHAADI application as listed below:  1) The simple registration process in 5 minutes only. 2) User-friendly Match search option. 3) You can easily express your interest in any matching profile. 4) You can bookmark preferred profiles for future reference. 5) Get instant notifications about Interests and Accepts sent to you. 6) Contact details are just a click away. 7) The most visited matrimony portal in India. 8) Saral Shaadi Application is lightweight and takes less storage space. Download the SaralShaadi app today for FREE and meet your perfect life Partner. All the best in your partner search!
